description:
If you're a huge baseball fan, this is the app for you! Baseball Fans provides you with access to the latest news, videos, stats, schedule, standings and results for all 30 professional teams.  It’s like getting 30 apps in one!  You can easily switch between teams to get the latest info for each one.  Included in the app are Arizona, Atlanta, Baltimore, Boston, Chicago C, Chicago W, Cincinnati, Cleveland, Colorado, Detroit, Florida, Houston, Kansas City, Los Angeles A, Los Angeles D, Milwaukee, Minnesota, New York M, New York Y, Oakland, Philadelphia, Pittsburgh, San Diego, San Francisco, Seattle, St. Louis, Tampa Bay, Texas, Toronto and Washington. 

Each team has its own message board where you can discuss the latest news and highlights with other fans.  Make sure your voice is heard! 

There is no better or more comprehensive tool to stay up to date with your favourite baseball teams. If you are a true fan, you owe it to yourself to download Baseball Fans today!
